DOC.brief_summary: Quest modifier gene associate ventricular arrhythmia presence cardiac sodium channel gene ( SCN5A-delPhe1617 ) mutation .
DOC.brief_title: Worm Study : Modifier Genes Sudden Cardiac Death
DOC.detailed_description: In large Dutch SCN5A founder population malignant ventricular arrhythmia , investigator aim identify genetic modifier mean whole-exome sequence establish comprehensive genotype-phenotype correlation , focus clinical cellular electrophysiological characteristic neurocardiac modulation .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( mutation carrier group ) : Age ≥ 18 year . Heterozygous homozygous carriership SCN5AdelPhe1617 . Confirmed kinship founder population haplotype analysis use predefined microsatellite marker . Written informed consent . Inclusion Criteria ( nonmutation carrier group ) : Age ≥ 18 year . Non SCN5AdelPhe1617 genotype . Confirmed kinship Founder Group haplotype analysis use predefined microsatellite marker . Written informed consent . Inclusion criterion Spouse Group Age ≥ 18 year .
